JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Full time waiter/waitress for Restaurant Havfruen - A Seafood Bistro
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Restaurant Havfruen in Nyhavn is a seafood bistro with a focus on freshly caught sustainable seafood from Danish waters. We are currently looking for two full-time collegues.

 

We expect you to have experience from the service industry and would like experience from the restaurant industry. Furthermore we expect that you want to contribute with a good mood, that you thrive on being busy and that you are passionate about providing good guest experiences.

Nyhavn is one of Copenhagen's busiest destinations in the summer time especially. We have many locals and international tourists. We want to be the favorite place for both and you have to help us with that! We strive to provide good experiences for our guests, while we place great emphasis on creating a good workplace for our team.

 

As a full-time employee you get a central role in the restaurant's daily life and it is therefore important that you have the desire to familiarize yourself well with the menu so that you can help our guests in the best possible way.
You do not have to be an expert on either fish or wines in advance - we will gladly help you with that.

If you do not already know us, you can get to know us a little better here:
https://www.instagram.com/havfruen_nyhavn39/
https://www.restauranthavfruen.dk/

 

If you want to be part of our team, we look forward to hearing from you. Send an application with CV and photo and feel free to tell us why you are the right candidate.

Please send us your application at soeren@restauranthavfruen.dk

We want the position filled as soon as possible, so we have the opportunity to give you a thorough training before a hopefully busy summer.

We are looking forward to hearing from you!

All the best,

Soeren and team Havfruen

details.FormattedPurpose:
Restaurant Havfruen in Nyhavn is a seafood bistro with a focus on freshly caught sustainable seafood from Danish waters. We are currently looking for two full-time collegues.

 

We expect you to have experience from the service industry and would like experience from the restaurant industry. Furthermore we expect that you want to contribute with a good mood, that you thrive on being busy and that you are passionate about providing good guest experiences.

Nyhavn is one of Copenhagen's busiest destinations in the summer time especially. We have many locals and international tourists. We want to be the favorite place for both and you have to help us with that! We strive to provide good experiences for our guests, while we place great emphasis on creating a good workplace for our team.

 

As a full-time employee you get a central role in the restaurant's daily life and it is therefore important that you have the desire to familiarize yourself well with the menu so that you can help our guests in the best possible way.
You do not have to be an expert on either fish or wines in advance - we will gladly help you with that.

If you do not already know us, you can get to know us a little better here:
https://www.instagram.com/havfruen_nyhavn39/
https://www.restauranthavfruen.dk/

 

If you want to be part of our team, we look forward to hearing from you. Send an application with CV and photo and feel free to tell us why you are the right candidate.

Please send us your application at soeren@restauranthavfruen.dk

We want the position filled as soon as possible, so we have the opportunity to give you a thorough training before a hopefully busy summer.

We are looking forward to hearing from you!

All the best,

Soeren and team Havfruen
